sense.name: job
sense.commentary: TASK[+activity][+chore] chore, undertaking, project, labor - any piece of work that is undertaken or attempted
sense.examples: The task of repairing the engine took several hours. The endless task of classifying the samples became mind-numbing. The farmer's morning tasks took all day. These types of tasks are not included in Bob's job description. The mayor has appointed a task force to look into the matter.

sense.name: a reprimand or cricitism
sense.examples: She took him to task about his waffling voting record. They will be brought to task about their conduct at the game last night.
